headline.main: ISOLATION SCORED BY MRS. CARAWAY; She Tells Republican Women Opponents of Neutrality Act Revision Overlooks Facts

lead_paragraph: Attacking the isolationists. Mrs. Henry R. Caraway, former president of the Women's National Republican Club, broke away yesterday from her criticism of the present administration to defend President Roosevelt against charges that he had ignored his campaign pledges.
abstract: Mrs H R Caraway scores continuation of non-defense projects
